item.title: [9/11] Cover-up. Try telling me now the goverment wasnt involved
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“Xerxes, post:55, topic:9228”][quote author=nade link=topic=13182.msg156913#msg156913 date=1155662616]
Who cares? Governments kill thousands of people and get rich. Get used to it and quit bitching. If you don’t like it the move the fuck out.
[/quote]

Yup. Here is a small list of what they gained from this:

[ul][li]Money[/li]
[li]Oil - Oil is running out[/li]
[li]Making laws they couldn’t before, such as The Patriot Act[/li]
[li]The use of 9/11 in speeches and such.[/li]
[li]Homeland Security Stuff[/li]
[li]Here we go again to the two first points, Weapon companies, oil companies etc make big money.[/li]
[li]Here we go to the point above, war in middle east.[/li]
[li]Fear[/li]
[li]This so called war on terror would never have happened without 9/11[/li]
[li]Politics[/li]
[li]etc…[/li][/ul]

They have done so many stuff, why not this?

You can also read 9/11 threads from a while ago, in the debate section if I am not wrong, also look here: http://s15.invisionfree.com/Loose_Change_Forum/index.php?act=idx
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 15, 2006, 08:35:43 AM[/size][hr]Btw, I know this is kinda old, however, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IygchZRJVXM

Wouldn’t you think they could make a 9/11 stuff if they wanted? Meh… [br][size=1]Posted at: August 24, 2006, 11:55:01 AM[/size][hr]Also, http://www.question911.com/linksall.htm[/quote]

PMG Xerxes finally posted something that isnt spam!!!

item.description:
@xSignal wrote:

[quote=“Xerxes, post:52, topic:9228”]http://www.ccdominoes.com/lc/lcg2.html - This is pure bullshit. I read it like what, half page and I noticed alot of crap. I’m pretty sure he can’t answer every single thing, I mean, they are 5000 sites like this that are the opposite way, they reply to these “9/11 wasen’t a inside job” etc, on their own site. Makes no sense.

It’s up to you to decide. I personally believe it was a inside job, and some questions are still left unanswered, for example. Why did minutes after these stuff, the Agents come and take away video tapes from hotels and such, why were they never released? Bullshit, once again. Some questions are still left unanswered.

I could write like him too, answer him, but I am too lazy and I don’t care what you think, up to you.

– and no it’s not a joke, jealous motherfucker.[/quote]

@runescape192 wrote:

One of my biggest problems is that with beliving this and how could Bush be involved? He is a complete idiot and there is no way he was smart enough to pull this off.

Also, haven’t there always been theries saying that someone with power was involed?For example what about John F. Kennedys assassination. There are many theiores and there is a thery I belive it was called the X factor that someone from the goverment up to even the the Vice president had been involed with the assassination of John F.Kennedy.I don’t belive there is any evidene since John Harvey Oswald ( belived to have fired the shot that killed JFK) and Jack Ruby( the one whp hired Oswald) are both dead. So this will just be another Cold Case.

I think this is also another theiry, but its just not true.

item.title: [9/11] Cover-up. Try telling me now the goverment wasnt involved
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

ok you fuckwits that are just constantly flaming, saying its all fake, its impossible, america is #1. Either Open your eyes, or close your mouths, or at least start supplying evidence to support your claims, cause this video is more than youve supplied so far other than smartass comments.

Wether you think it was a coverup or not, you cannot deny evidence until you look at it, so before you start saying its all fake, look at the video.

I watched it a few days ago, and i was drawn in, but not totaly convinced, so i went further than any of you idiots have gone, and actualy tried to find out more information, i found some of the records, i checked the public government files. Virtualy everything on that video is true and the things that wernt, whernt lies either, as they couldnt be disprooved otherwise.

I then went a step further, and researched various other ‘events’ that have happened in america, including the Kenedy assination and Pearl Harbour. There is undisputable proof for people that care to actualy look that prooves these where both cover-ups, as where many other events that have transpired in american history.

my opinion is, the american government is corrupt, and is willing to do anything to get what it wants, including hurting its own people. Where will it stop? Who knows, but i for one do not plan to sit idly bye, while America desides they want something and kills me or people i know to get to it.
Wether you believe my opinion or not, it is not ok to flame it, your entitled to your opinion, and im entiled to mine.

People who would like to talk further about this pm me please, being a Criminologist in training (which is International Security stuff) i have alot of interest in this kind of stuff.

Thats my 2 cents, you can keep the change

[quote=“Xerxes, post:20, topic:9228”]Yes. They would kill 3,000 to make new laws, attack a few countries, higher security, get “big brother” going etcetc.

Do you guys even think? No. Do you know anything about conspirancy? No. Do you read books? No. Do you listen? No. Do you know anything about US history and similiar stuff? No. Do even know what happends in background when something like 9/11 happends? No.

No one of you should post because you have simply no idea. I think I will start answering your questions and talk to you - go on.[/quote]

In the last 3 days ive reserched my ass off on US history and the supposed ‘coverups’
I think i have a fairly good idea what happened now during 9/11, aswell as the pros and cons from America, and the supposed ‘terrorists’.

Now, where you simply flaming the people that didnt have an idea, or where you flaming the idea of a conspiracy itself? Im not sure where you stand on this matter Xerxes

Read full topic

item.title: [9/11] Cover-up. Try telling me now the goverment wasnt involved
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“runescape192, post:45, topic:9228”]I am sorry but I am not going to watch an hour movie, but I would like to bring something that has happend lately into this.

What about that latest plan that thoses terriosrst had to destroy thoses american planes flying back from britian.

Now the terriost were not al queda, but I have been hearing on the news this was an Al Queda plan. They did not actully have control, but it was there plan, which just happned to be realted very close to 9/11. Most of them actully had been trained at an Al Queda camp also i belive.

[br][size=1]Posted at: August 14, 2006, 11:56:22 PM[/size][hr]I will watch part of the movie later. [br][size=1]Posted at: August 14, 2006, 11:57:50 PM[/size][hr]Also what about the presvious of bin laden to destroy the world trade center?[/quote]

I agree BUT. If i was accused of something so bad that i hadnt done like terrorism i’d be like fuck you all im going to do it now. I mean if it is true and bush was behind 9/11 think about all the innocent people dieing in the hands of the american & british army? Wouldnt you be angry if your people were dieing for no reason and you were being used as a escape goat so that the invaders could have a reason to come into your country?

However i think the terrosists are going about it the wrong way. Blowing more people up isnt going to solve anything.

item.title: [9/11] Cover-up. Try telling me now the goverment wasnt involved
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

[quote=“Source1, post:32, topic:9228”]Taios: “billoinare” was a typo, you on the other hand have demonstrated that you do not know BASIC grammar and spelling.

Of course the Iraqi people will think poorly of America, we are at war with them you idiot. I don’t know where you get the idea that all Muslims are perceived as terrorists, or why you would be stupid enough to debate your Muslim friend on how Muslims live…

I am familiar with their situation in the UK, where they are receiving govt. aid, but the idea that they are all living in big houses without working a day in their lives if complete bullshit, I don’t know why you would believe something that stupid and farfetched.

What evidence are you talking about? The video some kid in college with too much time on his hands made? Do you think people view that as an authority of the events of 9/11 and the continuing war on terror? Why would it confirm what you are thinking? Do you believe everything you see?

No, nuclear weapons aren’t just “hanging outside,” that is what you implied when you said we have satelite mapping to uncover them.

I never said nothing is kept secret, but the consequences of the revelation of such a conspiracy would mean an end to America as we know it. Why would anyone be willing to take that gamble?

Your last sentence makes no sense at all, I have no idea how it plays into your argument–in fact it rebukes it.

Xerxes: “Your post make no sense at all.” Do you think that makes sense, idiot? You can’t even come up with a coherent response to what I have said.[/quote]

Because I cant bother reading your smartass comments.

Read full topic

item.title: [9/11] Cover-up. Try telling me now the goverment wasnt involved
item.dc:creator: @Taios Taios
item.description:
@Taios wrote:

[quote=“Source1, post:32, topic:9228”]Taios: “billoinare” was a typo, you on the other hand have demonstrated that you do not know BASIC grammar and spelling.

Of course the Iraqi people will think poorly of America, we are at war with them you idiot. I don’t know where you get the idea that all Muslims are perceived as terrorists, or why you would be stupid enough to debate your Muslim friend on how Muslims live…

I am familiar with their situation in the UK, where they are receiving govt. aid, but the idea that they are all living in big houses without working a day in their lives if complete bullshit, I don’t know why you would believe something that stupid and farfetched.

What evidence are you talking about? The video some kid in college with too much time on his hands made? Do you think people view that as an authority of the events of 9/11 and the continuing war on terror? Why would it confirm what you are thinking? Do you believe everything you see?

No, nuclear weapons aren’t just “hanging outside,” that is what you implied when you said we have satelite mapping to uncover them.

I never said nothing is kept secret, but the consequences of the revelation of such a conspiracy would mean an end to America as we know it. Why would anyone be willing to take that gamble?

Your last sentence makes no sense at all, I have no idea how it plays into your argument–in fact it rebukes it.

Xerxes: “Your post make no sense at all.” Do you think that makes sense, idiot? You can’t even come up with a coherent response to what I have said.[/quote]

We live in diffrent places. Here they are all perceived as terroists.

  1. Where have i said iraq’s hate american’s?

AND no its not complete bullshit, you dont live here so go die. As you may know there was or still is a mass evacuation undergoing, one man i cant rememeber his name boasted how he had a huge house, 5 children and had never worked here whatsoever and he told the papers, it was published he was kicked out the country he also said how he thought terroists are great, during the mass evacuation he asked to come back, his request was denied as he was no longer a uk citizen. HA goverment aid? I think its great we accept refuges but alot of them take the piss. You go to london, deep into it and try and find a single english person the goverment is giving them more than just aid. However who can blame them? If your offerd money, your bound to take it.

The last sentence i made clearly is not part of the arguement, all i was saying is i dont think terroism is good so dont get the wrong idea.

I make many typo’s and im proud that i dont triple check my posts for spelling errors or punctuation errors.
